comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Are you basically an online wallet that supports multi currency? Sorry for the confusion.Nice ANN design and the website interface looks good too. But I guess it's a ready made theme where you worked, not a big deal though.Welcome to the forum Wallmer.1. You have done the homework buying the copper membership which allowed you to post image. Good work on that.2. You must have a promotion plan on the forum. In that case I can help you. It will need long discussion to understand though. But feel free contact me on my telegram if you are interested.Cheers,

comments.author: Wallmer
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on February 21, 2023, 02:41:38 PMAre you basically an online wallet that supports multi currency? Sorry for the confusion.Nice ANN design and the website interface looks good too. But I guess it's a ready made theme where you worked, not a big deal though.Welcome to the forum Wallmer.1. You have done the homework buying the copper membership which allowed you to post image. Good work on that.2. You must have a promotion plan on the forum. In that case I can help you. It will need long discussion to understand though. But feel free contact me on my telegram if you are interested.Cheers,Thanks for your feedback. I've shared your proposition with the marketing department.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Wallmer on February 22, 2023, 02:03:07 PMThanks for your feedback. I've shared your proposition with the marketing department. Nice to know. I am almost always available on my telegram. Feel free to reach out anytime.Cheers,

comments.author: A13X
comments.body: Haven't heard anything about you yet, do you support TRX ? Any plans to add new blockchains ?Cheers,

comments.author: Wallmer
comments.body: Quote from: A13X on February 23, 2023, 07:34:00 PMHaven't heard anything about you yet, do you support TRX ? Any plans to add new blockchains ?Cheers, Hi and thanks for your questions. Regarding TRX - yes, we support Tron network. New blockchains are coming: ADA, DOT, Avax etc.

comments.author: Wallmer
comments.body: Quote from: A13X on February 23, 2023, 07:34:00 PMHaven't heard anything about you yet, do you support TRX ? Any plans to add new blockchains ?Cheers, BTW, at the same time, you can add any TRX address in the portfolio tracker. If you have any questions just let me know.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: Wallmer on February 26, 2023, 03:42:00 PMNew blockchains are coming: ADA, DOT, Avax etc. Better if you allow adding custom networks for evm chains, like metamask does. I dunno how hard it would be implement it but there is already plenty evm chains avaialble and new ones keep popping up, instead of keeping up, let user decide.
